SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 4: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 4.2: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development, care and pre‐primary education so that they are ready for primary education

SDG_CUSTODIAN_AGENCIES__GLOBAL: United Nations Education and Scientific Cultural Organisation - Institute of Statistics (UNESCO-UIS)
REC_USE_LIM__GLOBAL: This indicator is being used as an approximation of the UN SDG Indicator. Where possible, we will work to identify or develop UK data to meet the global indicator specification. This indicator has been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
